comment:
* Record of energy and activity information from controller and
 * underlying wifi stack state. Timestamp the record with elapsed
 * real-time.
 * @hide

public long getTimeSinceBootMillis()
methods.comment: Get the timestamp (elapsed real time milliseconds since boot) of record creation.

methods.name: public int getStackState()
methods.comment:
* Get the Wifi stack reported state. One of {@link #STACK_STATE_INVALID},
     * {@link #STACK_STATE_STATE_ACTIVE}, {@link #STACK_STATE_STATE_SCANNING},
     * {@link #STACK_STATE_STATE_IDLE}.

methods.name: public long getControllerTxDurationMillis()
methods.comment: Get the Wifi transmission duration, in milliseconds.

methods.name: public long getControllerRxDurationMillis()
methods.comment: Get the Wifi receive duration, in milliseconds.

methods.name: public long getControllerScanDurationMillis()
methods.comment: Get the Wifi scan duration, in milliseconds.

methods.name: public long getControllerIdleDurationMillis()
methods.comment: Get the Wifi idle duration, in milliseconds.

methods.name: public long getControllerEnergyUsedMicroJoules()
methods.comment: Get the energy consumed by Wifi, in microjoules.

methods.name: public boolean isValid()
methods.comment:
* Returns true if the record is valid, false otherwise.
